name: Hida
description:
First off theirs probably still a ton of issues to work on so when I am not exhausted I'll try and work on them as best I can. 

---Inro----

So after leading my first team game jam which was not the best. So I decided to try solo. 

After a long week of coding advice from friends and brainstorming.  I created my second attempt at a game jam

Hope you enjoy!

Credit. 

Programming & gameplay: Ethan S (Me)

Music: Will C

Voice Over: Stg. Bakes

Grunts and Hida; Craft

Special Thanks: My wonderful wife and my friend David who's a pro and helped a ton.

Sadly I am a software engineering student and not an artist so all assets I used are bellow.

Assets used:

Goblin & Samurai Model: Luiz Melo

Forest art: Eder

Enemy model: Clembod

--- Controls ---

A & D moves left and right 

Space to jump 

Left mouse to attack
